column5: We will be crossing at Int. Falls around 6/24 or 6/25. What is the best time of day or night to cross?
[font color=green size=3][b]The best time is always in the wee hours of the morning, less trafic. The worst time is 8-5 M-F when the full 1st shift is looking for somebody to shake down.
Best time is when all customs officer are sleeping!
We normally cross at 7:00am and its wide open then. Never a wait! When we come back through its normally 9am a week later, and there is a pretty good line coming back at that hour.
Night is the best time to cross! Or early in the morning. Scharby
Cross at night past 6:00 or early in the morning.

We will be crossing at Int'l Falls at about noon on 6/24, and have on that same Friday the past two years - no issues at all. Maybe a 10 minute wait at most. On the way back, we cross about 10:00 am and its about 20 minutes to get back in to the US.
